name: Super Duper Pooper
description:
The objective is simple: collect food, fill the toilets, don't die.

Controls

Walk: Left/Right Arrow Keys, A/D Keys, or Joystick on Gamepad

Jump: Space or Button 1 on Gamepad (A for Xbox Controller)

Drop: Right Ctrl or Button 2 on Gamepad (B for Xbox Controller)

Loosen Your Bowels: Enter or Button 3 on Gamepad (X For Xbox Controller)

Story (Seriously?)

In the midst of the biggest deal of his life, the contracting agents he works for are skeptical of Clyde's new jumbo size community toilet bowls. In order to show them that they are needed and are being used already, Clyde must overload the sewer system with as much scatalogical traffic as possible!

Audio SFX/Music Credits:

Picked up these collections in humble bundles:

  • Pro Sound Collection
  • Sci Fi SFX (Edited the alien larvae sound for a squishy bounce)
  • Storytellers Music Pack
